name: Shoot The Dice!
description:
Welcome To Shoot The Dice!
You play as a tank who can shoot bullets while dodging bouncy dice and trying to solve simple math problems! Controls: Keyboard:

A / D | Arrow Keys || Movement

W / Up Arrow || Shooting

Space || Lock In

Gamepad (Recommended):

Joystick | D-Pad || Movement

Right Trigger | Left Trigger || Shooting

Any Face Button || Lock In

Leave any feedback in the comments below!
